de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.database.ids.distance

Interface KNNList<D extends Distance<D>>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - Distance type
    All Superinterfaces:
    DBIDs, DistanceDBIDList<D>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DoubleDistanceKNNList
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DistanceDBIDPairKNNList, DoubleDistanceDBIDPairKNNList, DoubleDistanceIntegerDBIDKNNList, DoubleDistanceIntegerDBIDKNNListHeap, DoubleDistanceKNNSubList, KNNSubList

    public interface KNNList<D extends Distance<D>>
extends DistanceDBIDList<D>
    Interface for kNN results. To iterate over the results, use the following code: 
     for (DistanceDBIDResultIter<D> iter = result.iter(); iter.valid(); iter.advance()) {
   // You can get the distance via: iter.getDistance();
   // Or use iter just like any other DBIDRef
 }
    If you are only interested in the IDs of the objects, the following is also sufficient: 
     for (DBIDIter<D> iter = result.iter(); iter.valid(); iter.advance()) {
   // Use iter just like any other DBIDRef
 }
